biotools.summary: Spectracular is a computational tool to support selection of fluorochromes for multicolor flow cytometry panels. Specifically, Spectracular finds the optimal (or near-optimal) combination of fluorochromes from a user-defined pool of fluorochromes to choose from.

bioschemas.name: Spectracular
bioschemas.summary: Spectracular is a computational tool to support selection of fluorochromes for multicolor flow cytometry panels. Specifically, Spectracular finds the optimal (or near-optimal) combination of fluorochromes from a user-defined pool of fluorochromes to choose from.
